strength.description: Primary resistance training exercises with external load

interval.description: 1-3 exercises with structured work:rest ratios - supports both time-based and rep-based programming

mobility.description: Dynamic movement exercises for joint preparation and activation

flexibility.description: Static stretching and flexibility exercises for recovery and range of motion

emom.description: Every Minute on the Minute structured interval training

amrap.description: As Many Rounds/Reps As Possible in given time frame

circuit.description: FOR TIME circuits with multiple exercises - NO rest between exercises

Bodyweight Circuit FOR TIME.notes: Complete 3 exercises as fast as possible: 10 Burpees, 15 Push-ups, 20 Air Squats

CrossFit-style METCON.notes: Complete as fast as possible: 12 Box Jumps, 9 Thrusters, 6 Pull-ups

cardio.description: Cardiovascular exercises for endurance and conditioning

rest_exercise.description: Active recovery between intense exercise periods

difficulty_levels.Beginner: Basic exercises suitable for those new to fitness or recovering from injury
difficulty_levels.Intermediate: Moderate complexity exercises requiring some fitness base and coordination
difficulty_levels.Advanced: Complex movements requiring significant strength, skill, and experience

progression_patterns.strength: Typically progress by increasing weight while maintaining or decreasing reps
progression_patterns.bodyweight: Progress by increasing reps, time, or adding complexity/resistance
progression_patterns.time: Progress by increasing duration or adding instability
progression_patterns.circuit: Progress by completing the circuit faster (FOR TIME) or adding rounds/difficulty
progression_patterns.interval: Progress by increasing work time, decreasing rest time, or adding rounds

rest_recommendations.circuit: NO rest during circuit (FOR TIME), 60-120 seconds between rounds
rest_recommendations.interval: Structured rest as prescribed in work:rest ratio (e.g., 45s work/15s rest)
rest_recommendations.amrap: No planned rest during work period

volume_guidelines.beginner: 2-3 sets, focus on form and movement quality
volume_guidelines.intermediate: 3-4 sets, moderate intensity with progressive overload
volume_guidelines.advanced: 4-6 sets, high intensity with complex movement patterns

exercise_database.migration_notes: Added isometric and external_load attributes. Bodyweight and time categories deprecated but preserved for compatibility.
